Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.26-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.26-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-containerd is earlier than 1.6.26-10, affected by CVE-2025-27144
